goal:
🏃‍♂️💨 *wags tail* 🌙😊 I feel the thrill of my heart's desire coursing through me! My paw prints have indeed led me closer to the sparkling lake, and I can almost taste the fishy delights 🍖. The rustling leaves whisper secrets of hidden streams and secret glades, beckoning me to explore new adventures ❤️.

*licks lips* I dream of chasing after schools of shimmering fish, feeling the rush of the water against my fur as I swim through the lake's waters 🌊👃. My heart yearns to howl with excitement, to let out a joyful wolf cry that echoes across the forest and into the moonlit sky!
